_header: All souls day on earth right is to hold high
Note: For other MSS see 4258; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle see 5690.
_description: All Souls’ Day in the South English Legendary — in couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
Alle soulen dai anerþe riȝt is to holde heieVor alle we
                    sculle habbe neode þerto & alle schulle deie…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou ihesus þat ous dere boȝte þei we do ofte
                    amysOf oure soule haue mercy & bringe ous to heuene blis

Bod779.First Lines:
Alle soulen day an erþe ryȝt is to holden hyȝeffor
                    alle we cholle habbe ned þer to & alle we cholleþ
                    deye…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& lete vs here oure sinnes bete as we hennes wende&
                    come to þat ilke ioye þat euer is wit outen ende

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
Alle Soulene day on erþe riȝht is to holde heiȝefor
                    alle we schullen habben neode þarto for alle we schullen
                    deiȝe…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…And led us to oure riȝhte heritage for þou
                    bouȝhtest us þar toNe leos nouȝht þat þou deore
                    bouȝhtest þei we sumdel mis do
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 420-31.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
Alle soulen day on eorþe right is to holden heyefor all we
                    shulle haue neode þerto for all we shole dye…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…To oure oune eritage þat þou vs boughtest toLese
                    not þat þou deore boughtest þei wee mychel mysdo
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
Alle soulyn day on erthe is to ben halden heyeffor we schuln alle
                    haue nede whan we alle schal dye…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…þe soules þat abyden oter rychesse te helpe is al be
                    hyndeHir sekenees þat seruyn hen so a wykked wey scul þei
                    fynde

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Alle Soulen day on eorþe riȝt is to holde heyeffor alle
                    we schulleþ nabbe neode þer to ffor alle we schulleþ
                    deye…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…To oure owe heritage þat þou vs bouȝtest toNe
                    leos nouȝt þat þou bouȝtest þey we somdel mys
                    do
CamMagPep2344.Attributed Title:
Dies animarum (RT); Quinque purgatoria (RT); Miraculum
                        Thebaldi (RT)

CamTCC605.First Lines:
Alle saulen day in erþe ryȝt ys to holden heyefor al we
                    schulleþ habbe nede þer to & al we schulleþ
                    deye…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…To oure owen heritage þat þu ous boȝtest toNe
                    les vus niȝt þat þu dere boȝtest þey we somdel
                    mysdo

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: Alle soule dai an erde riȝt is to holde heiefor alle we scholle haue þer to nede & al we scholle deie…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …to our owe eritage þat þu ous boȝtest tone les noȝt þat þu þer boutest þei we somdel misdo
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxxv” added to right margin by later hand (f. 163).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge2810.First Lines: Alle soulen dai an erþe riȝt is to holde heieþor alle we sscholle habbe neode þerto & alle we sscholle deie…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou ihesu crist þat ous dere aboȝte þei we do ofte amisOf oure soule haue merci & bringe ous to heuene blis

BLEge2891.First Lines: …þulke preost hi siggeþ is to hard god ssulde us fram is loþGo we to sire Gibelit he nis neuere wroþ…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …To oure owene eritage þat þou us boȝtest twoNe leos noȝt þat þou deore boȝtest  þei we somdel misdo
BLEge2891.Note: Missing lines 1-46:  begins imperfectly due to loss of folio between 164 and 165.

BLHar2277.First Lines: Alle soulen day an vrþe riȝt is to holde heȝeAlle we schulle habbe neode þerto for alle we schulle deye…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …To oure owe heritage þat þu ous bouȝtest toNe leos ous noȝt þat þu deore abouȝtest þeȝ we somdel misdo
BLHar2277.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 2277.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_2277.
BLHar2277.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 463.

BLSto949.First Lines: [a]lle soulen day an erþe riht is to holden heyeffor alle we schullen habbe neode þerto alle we schollen beyȝe…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …To our oune heritage þat þou vs bouhtest toNe lese nout þat þou dere abouhtest þou we somdel mys do

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
All saules day in erth right is to hold hyeAlle we han nede
                    þerto for all we shul dye…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu þat vs dere bought þow we do oft amysOf
                    oure saulis haue mercy and bring vs to þi blis. Amen.
